item.title: Suddenly You Feel Sorry for Hillary
item.description: Maybe you felt a twinge of pity when you saw that video of Hillary Clinton’s scary collapse today. In a moment you’ll see who’s to blame, and it’s not Hillary. If you haven’t seen the disturbing video, here it is, h/t thegatewaypundit.com: https://youtu.be/fo-pG2qChUI You could write off your emotions to the emotions of the day. It’s the 15th anniversary of the 9/11 attacks. Your nerves are probably a bit frayed as you remember what you were doing when you realized that America was under attack.
